item.title: 贸易缓和，长周末后美股期货反弹
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普收回了对欧盟征收高额关税的威胁，随着交易员们在阵亡将士纪念日假期结束后返回美国，美国与欧洲集团之间的紧张关系有所缓和，美国股指期货周二跳涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures jumped on Tuesday after President Donald Trump rolled back his threat of steep tariffs against the EU and tensions between the United States and the European bloc cooled as traders returned after the Memorial Day break.】

item.title: 台积电将在德国慕尼黑设立欧洲芯片设计中心
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the world's largest contract chipmaker, will open a chip design centre in Munich, Germany, a company executive said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 部长称南非不会对马斯克的 "星链 "给予 "特殊照顾
item.description: 南非通信部长索利-马拉齐（Solly Malatsi）周二表示，他提出的承认黑人所有权要求替代方案的政策草案并不仅仅针对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 "星链"（Starlink）。【原文：South Africa's Communications Minister Solly Malatsi said on Tuesday that his proposed draft policy that recognises alternatives to Black ownership requirements was not only meant for Elon Musk's Starlink.】

item.title: 在澳大利亚推动本地所有权之际，中国港口运营商表示，Cerberus 看中了达尔文港
item.description: 在澳大利亚政府推动达尔文港回归国内所有之际，达尔文港中国运营商的一位高管周二表示，美国私募股权公司Cerberus对收购达尔文港的租约表现出了兴趣。【原文：U.S. private equity firm Cerberus has shown interest in acquiring the lease for Darwin Port, a senior executive of the port's Chinese operator said on Tuesday, amid a push by the Australian government for the port to be returned to domestic ownership.】

item.title: Jio BlackRock 获准在印度开展共同基金业务
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实集团（Reliance Group）和总部位于美国的贝莱德（BlackRock）周二表示，印度市场监管部门已批准两家公司开展共同基金业务。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Group and U.S.-based BlackRock have received approval from India's markets regulator to start operations for their mutual fund business, the Indian company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 肯德基 5 年内将在英国和爱尔兰投资 20 亿美元，创造 7000 个就业岗位
item.description: 百胜餐饮集团旗下的肯德基周二表示，计划在未来五年内在英国和爱尔兰投资 14.9 亿英镑（20 亿美元），创造 7000 多个就业岗位。【原文：Yum Brands' KFC plans to invest 1.49 billion pounds ($2.0 billion) in Britain and Ireland over the next five years, creating over 7,000 jobs, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国储蓄者谴责存款利率下降，但仍不愿多花钱
item.description: 上周中国银行下调存款利率后，Miro Chen 在社交媒体上发起了一项民意调查："当利率下降时，你会储蓄还是消费？"【原文：After Chinese banks reduced deposit rates last week, Miro Chen launched a social media poll: "When interest rates fall, do you save or spend?"】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利呼吁稳定利率，等待关税影响明朗化
item.description: 明尼苏达州联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周二呼吁在关税提高对通胀的影响更加明朗之前保持利率稳定，并警告说不要透过这种供应价格冲击的影响来看待问题。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minnesota President Neel Kashkari on Tuesday called for keeping interest rates steady until there is more clarity on how higher tariffs affect inflation, warning against looking through the impact of such supply price shocks.】

item.title: 消息人士称，布鲁塞尔要求欧洲企业详细说明美国投资计划
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，欧盟委员会已要求欧洲主要公司和首席执行官详细说明他们在美国的投资计划，以期在与华盛顿的紧张贸易谈判中获得弹药。【原文：The European Commission has asked leading European companies and CEOs to detail their U.S. investment plans, according to two sources familiar with the matter, in a bid to gain ammunition in crunch trade talks with Washington.】

item.title: 业务蓬勃发展，欧洲防务公司争相招聘员工
item.description: 帕维尔-切查尔（Pavel Cechal）认为，只要他能找到员工，他所供职的捷克公司很容易就能为其导弹和无人机发动机创造更多的业务，从而将员工人数增加一倍。【原文：Pavel Cechal reckons the Czech company he works for could easily generate more business for its missile and drone engines to double its workforce, if only he could find the staff.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战危及西班牙制帽商与美国东正教犹太人的业务往来
item.description: 一家西班牙帽子制造商警告说，向美国东正教犹太人供应毡帽的 40 年传统有可能成为唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战的牺牲品。【原文：A Spanish hatmaker warned that a 40-year tradition of supplying felt hats to Orthodox Jews in the U.S. risked becoming a casualty in President Donald Trump's trade war.】

item.title: 萨博防务集团重申 2023-2027 年财务目标
item.description: 瑞典防务材料制造商萨博周二重申了 2023-2027 年有机销售额增长 18% 左右的目标，营业收入增长将高于有机销售额增长。【原文：Swedish defence material maker Saab reiterated on Tuesday its 2023-2027 targets for organic sales growth of around 18% with operating income growth higher than organic sales growth.】

item.title: 日本超长期债券收益率下滑，因对外务省可能削减销售额持乐观态度
item.description: 据路透社报道，日本财务省可能会减少超长期日本政府债券（JGB）的发行量，因此这些债券的收益率周二大幅下跌。【原文：Yields on super-long Japanese government bonds (JGBs) fell sharply on Tuesday after Reuters reported the finance ministry may reduce the issuance of those bonds.】

item.title: 索尼在最新企业转型中提出分拆金融部门的理由
item.description: 索尼公司将于本周四为其金融部门制定发展战略，该部门将分拆上市，投资者认为这标志着公司转型的最新进展。【原文：Sony will on Thursday lay out the growth strategy for its financial arm set for a spin-off that has been welcomed by investors as marking the latest chapter in the company's transformation.】

item.title: 中国需求疲软导致澳大利亚小麦供应过剩
item.description: 分析师和贸易商表示，由于中国进口量下降以及竞争对手俄罗斯的充足供应带来的竞争，澳大利亚小麦库存可能会在本季结束时远高于去年，从而给价格带来压力。【原文：Australian wheat inventories will likely be much higher than last year at the end of the season, pressuring prices, because of a drop in Chinese imports and competition from ample supplies out of rival exporter Russia, analysts and traders said.】

item.title: 西南航空公司将对第一件托运行李收取 35 美元的费用
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周二表示，将向乘客收取一个托运行李 35 美元和第二个托运行李 45 美元的费用，从而结束该航空公司的免费行李政策。【原文：Southwest Airlines on Tuesday said it will charge customers $35 for one checked bag and $45 for the second, bringing an end to the airline's free luggage policy.】

item.title: 独家报道日本考虑减少超长期债券发行量
item.description: 两位消息人士周二告诉路透社记者，在近期超长债券收益率急剧上升之后，日本将考虑减少超长债券的发行量，因为政策制定者正试图安抚市场对政府财政恶化的担忧。【原文：Japan will consider trimming issuance of super-long bonds in the wake of recent sharp rises in yields for the notes, two sources told Reuters on Tuesday, as policymakers seek to soothe market concerns over worsening government finances.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美国混乱的贸易变化令市场警惕
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 欧洲 4 月汽车销量小幅下滑，特斯拉 49% 的跌幅削弱了电动汽车的涨势
item.description: 特斯拉 4 月份在欧洲的销量比去年同期下降了 49%，尽管电池电动汽车的销量增长了 27.8%，因为这家美国电动汽车制造商对其 Model Y 的升级几乎没有改善该品牌在该地区受损形象的迹象。【原文：Tesla's sales in Europe fell 49% in April from a year earlier, even as battery-electric sales rose by 27.8%, as the U.S. EV maker's upgrade of its Model Y shows little sign of improving the brand's tarnished image in the region.】

item.title: 独家报道中国监管机构传唤汽车制造商讨论 "零里程 "二手车销售问题
item.description: 一位直接了解此事的人士说，中国商务部将与行业机构和包括比亚迪和东风汽车在内的汽车制造商会面，讨论一种新出现的销售从未开过的 "二手车 "的趋势。【原文：China's commerce ministry will meet industry bodies and automakers including BYD and Dongfeng Motor to discuss an emerging trend of sales of "used cars" that were never driven, a person with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称丰田将把部分 GR Corolla 的生产转移到英国
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的人士透露，丰田计划将其 GR Corolla 跑车的部分生产转移到英国，并将斥资约 5600 万美元在英国建立一条专用生产线，生产出口北美的产品。【原文：Toyota plans to move some production of its GR Corolla sports car to Britain and will spend around $56 million on a dedicated line there to build exports for North America, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后亚洲股市下跌，美元走势艰难
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推迟了对欧盟货物征收 50%关税的威胁后，亚洲股市周二有所回落，但美国期货市场上涨，美元则连续第五个月下跌。【原文：Asian shares eased on Tuesday, though U.S. futures rose after President Donald Trump delayed his threatened 50% duties on European Union shipments, while the dollar was headed for a fifth straight monthly loss.】

item.title: 尽管贸易关系紧张，中国 4 月工业利润仍保持增长势头
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，中国 4 月份工业利润增速加快，这表明在与美国贸易关系紧张和国内通货紧缩压力挥之不去的情况下，中国经济仍有韧性。【原文：China's industrial profits picked up pace in April, official data showed on Tuesday, signalling economic resilience in the face of trade tensions with the United States and lingering deflationary pressures at home.】

item.title: 中国指责台湾对科技公司实施网络攻击
item.description: 中国广州市公安机关周二发表声明称，一家未具名科技公司遭受的网络攻击是台湾政府所为。【原文：Chinese public security authorities in the city of Guangzhou have attributed a cyberattack on an unnamed technology company to the Taiwan government, a statement showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国税制争论不休，美元走势受阻；日元上涨
item.description: 周二，由于投资者对全面税收和支出法案及其对美国债务状况影响的担忧继续削弱对美国资产的投资情绪，美元艰难地重新站稳了脚跟。【原文：The dollar struggled to regain its footing Tuesday as investor concerns over a sweeping tax and spending bill and its implications for the U.S. debt profile continued to undermine sentiment towards U.S. assets.】

item.title: 欧佩克+产量可能增加，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于市场参与者权衡了欧佩克+在本周晚些时候的会议上决定进一步增加原油产量的可能性，周二油价有所回落。【原文：Oil prices eased on Tuesday as market participants weighed the possibility of an OPEC+ decision to further increase its crude oil output at a meeting later this week.】

item.title: 日本央行上田呼吁警惕食品通胀风险
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行必须警惕食品价格上涨可能推高基本通胀率的风险，基本通胀率已经接近2%的目标，这表明日本央行准备继续加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan must be vigilant to the risk rising food prices could push up underlying inflation that is already near its 2% target, Governor Kazuo Ueda said, signaling the central bank's readiness to continue its rate hikes.】

item.title: 英国国际清算银行敦促各国政府遏制债务 "无情 "增长
item.description: 国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）总经理奥古斯丁-卡斯滕斯（Agustin Carstens）周二表示，由于利率上升使一些国家的财政道路难以为继，全球各国政府必须遏制公共债务的 "无情 "增长。【原文：Governments across the globe must curb their "relentless" rise in public debt as higher interest rates make fiscal paths for some countries unsustainable, Agustin Carstens, General Manager of the Bank for International Settlements said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特朗普媒体将筹集 30 亿美元用于加密货币
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引知情人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的社交媒体公司特朗普媒体与科技集团（Trump Media & Technology Group）计划融资约 30 亿美元，用于比特币等加密货币。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's social media firm, Trump Media & Technology Group , plans to raise about $3 billion to spend on cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 普京称微软、Zoom 等服务在俄罗斯应受到 "限制
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京周一表示，应 "扼杀 "微软和 Zoom 等有损俄罗斯利益的外国服务提供商。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin said on Monday that foreign service providers like Microsoft and Zoom that act against Russian interests should be "throttled".】
